job_overview:
We’re looking to hire ASAP! If you’re a creative, reliable, talented, enthusiastic, and initiative-driven video editor with strong English comprehension and social media awareness, this role is for you! What You'll Be Doing:
Designing awesome thumbnails that grab attention.
Editing video footage to create polished and engaging content.
Keeping things visually consistent with our brand.
Working closely with the team to bring ideas to life.

Work Schedule:
Graveyard shift: 8 PM - 4 AM (PH Time)

Salary:
Competitive – based on skills & experience

What You Bring to the Table:
Solid experience with video editing in Adobe Premiere Pro
Creative and flashy thumbnail creations using Adobe Photoshop
Strong English reading comprehension & communication skills
Creative thinker who takes initiative & can work independently
Social media-savvy – understands trends, perfect timing of cuts, and English slang
Must be reliable and consistent in delivering high-quality edits

**If you do not use Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe Photoshop, DO NOT APPLY!!!



How to Apply:
